fnss.adapters.ns2.validate_ns2_stacks¶

validate_ns2_stacks(topology)[source]¶

Validate whether the stacks and applications of a topology are valid for ns-2 deployment

Parameters:

topology : Topology

The topology object to validate
Returns:

valid : bool

True if stacks are valid ns-2 stacks, False otherwise
